name: OCKDataSeriesConfiguration
desc: A configuration object that specifies which data should be queried and how it should be displayed by the graph.

items.name: init(taskID: String, legendTitle: String, gradientStartColor: UIColor, gradientEndColor: UIColor, markerSize: CGFloat, eventAggregator: OCKEventAggregator)
items.desc: Creates a configuration object that specifies how to query and display event data in a graph.

items.name: var taskID: String
items.desc: A user-provided unique identifier for a task.

items.name: var legendTitle: String
items.desc: The title the chart uses to represent the data series in the legend.

items.name: var markerSize: CGFloat
items.desc: The size of the line, bar, or scatter plot elements in the graph.

items.name: var aggregator: OCKEventAggregator
items.desc: A closure that accepts a dayâ€™s worth of events as an argument, and returns a y-axis value for that day.

items.name: var gradientStartColor: UIColor
items.desc: The first of two colors the gradient uses when plotting the data.

items.name: var gradientEndColor: UIColor
items.desc: The second of two colors the gradient uses when plotting the data.
